title: Silver 2 LF a Ranked Team

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body:
Been playing for fun with some mates at normal games... im ready to get back to rank especially as season 5 is starting soon. LF a team for Ranked; and maybe someone to duo queue with.

I use skype.

Also if anyone wants to just play for the lol in normals; give us an invite :)
IGN: Frostwolf77

replies.body:
hey man, 
we are 'constantly  inconsistent' 
in need of a mid laner, if your interested and have team speak 
feel free to give us a try

Hi, there. I'd love you to be addition to my team. We are currently looking for silvers to build a team from the ground up. I would love to hear from you.
IGN: Junior
Just hit me up and we'll talk about roles, etc.
